Option Name: # Leakiness Description: Qualitative description of infiltration.
# Units: The unit of measure for the air leakage if providing a numeric air leakage value.
# House Pressure: The house pressure relative to outside if providing a numeric air leakage value. Required when units are ACH or CFM.
# Value: Numeric air leakage value. For EffectiveLeakageArea, the value is in sq. in.
